description: They are accused of helping Islamist militants stage the 2015 Charlie Hebdo attack that killed 12.
title: Charlie Hebdo: 14 suspects on trial over Paris massacre
title_page: Charlie Hebdo: 14 suspects on trial over Paris massacre - BBC News
maintext: Three of the suspects are believed to have disappeared in northern Syria and Iraq and will be tried in absentia. Some reports suggest at least two of them were killed in bombing campaigns against the Islamic State group (IS). All three remain the subject of international arrest warrants.
